name: Made to Order - Bunting (prices per flag) (girls)
description:
Bunting is a great decoration for a party, BBQ or birthday! Perfect to brighten children's bedrooms & playrooms or to add the finishing touch to a wedding! Also good to just add a bit of colour to your home! ------------------------------------------- I can create bunting that can be personalised with name, initials or any word you want! I can put appliqué designs on of any shape you want. I can also do photo bunting, using your photos to create a lovely keepsake or you may just want plain bunting. You can mix and match too, so you can have for example
'plain-photo-N-A-M-E-photo-plain'
You choose the colours/fabrics and it is made to order! ------------------------------------------- All bunting is double-sided. Each flag measures approx 15x18cm and spaced approx 1cm apart and have 30cm ties at both ends. I am always happy to make bigger or smaller lengths so contact me if you any have special requirements. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to discuss your order! I can then do some sketches and show you some fabric combinations ect, then once your happy I'll get making! :) ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 3 weeks to make (depends how busy my order book is) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!) Disclaimer : These are not intended to be toys. They have not been safety tested and have small parts. They are detractive items only.

name: Made to Order - Freestanding Personalised Wooden Name Decoration (girls)
description: Handpainted freestanding personalised wooden name decoration. Makes a lovely decoration for a bedroom/nursery! If you're looking for a unique birthday present/christening gift for someone this is perfect! ------------------------------------------- Can be any word or name. Can also be painted any colour you wish. I can match a bedroom colour theme ect. There is two design options - vintage script or block. ------------------------------------------- Size is 10cm in height and the thickness is 1.8cm. The length will depend on the amount of letters. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to discuss your order! You will then need to tell me the name/word and colours and design ect. Then once you're happy I'll get making! If you would like a longer/shorter name/word than what is listed please contact me! ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 4-5 weeks to make (depends how busy my order book is and also on how quickly my supplier can cut the wood out) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!) Disclaimer : This is not a toy. They are keepsake decorative items only.

name: Made to Order - Wooden Name/Word Sign (girls)
description: Handpainted personalised wooden script name sign decoration. Makes a lovely decoration for a bedroom/nursery! They are perfect to be used as door name signs. If you're looking for a unique birthday present/christening gift for someone this is perfect! You can have a mix of letters and numbers. They also make lovely keepsakes/decoration for an occassion - Weddings, Birthdays, Anversireies, Christenings and other events. Some examples - Mr&Mrs_____ (Surname) / 'Welcome to our wedding' / 'Alfie's Christening' / '1st birthday' / 'Welcome to our home' / 'Welcome to the (Surname)'s' ect. Any word/name/message ------------------------------------------- Can be any word or name. Can also be painted any colour you wish. I can match a bedroom colour theme ect. They can be left plain, dotted or stiched design. ------------------------------------------- Size is 5cm in height and the thickness is 5mm. The length will depend on the amount of letters. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to discuss your order! You will then need to tell me the name/word and colours and design ect. Then once you're happy I'll get making! If you would like a longer name/word than what is listed please contact me! ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 4-5 weeks to make (depends how busy my order book is and also on how quickly my supplier can cut the wood out) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!) Disclaimer : This is not a toy. They are keepsake decorative items only.

name: Made to Order -Wooden Name Blocks (girls)
description: These handmade and hand painted wooden name blocks are great for the nursery/children's room. If you're looking for a unique present for someone, these are perfect! They are particularly great as a keepsake for a baby/child, so great for birthdays, christenings ect. ------------------------------------------- Can be any word or name. Some examples - GRANNY, NANNY, NANA, GRANDMA, GRANDAD, GRANDPA, MUMMY, MUM, DADDY, DAD, SISTER, BROTHER, BABY, FRIEND, WIFE, HUSBAND, MR & MRS, LOVE, HOME, WELCOME, ANY AGE OR A NAME? The possibilities are endless! ------------------------------------------- They can be any colour theme. You tell me the colours theme you would like. ------------------------------------------- Each cube size is 5 x 5cm THE PRICE IS PER BLOCK! So if you wanted the name 'RILEY' please order 5. If you want the name 'DAD' please order 3. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to discuss your order! You will then need to tell me the name/word and colours ect. Then once you're happy I'll get making! ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 4 weeks to make (depends how busy my order books are and also on how quickly my supplier can cut the wood out) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!) Disclaimer : These are are not intended to be toys or to be used as buliding blocks. They have not been safety tested and have small parts. They are keepsake decorative items.

name: Made to Order - Wooden Photo Blocks (girls)
description: These handmade wooden photo blocks make a lovely decoration for the home and you can't get more unique than these because they have your own personal photos on them! If you're looking for a unique present for someone, these are perfect! They are great for birthdays, christenings, weddings, Christmas, Fathers day, Mothers day. Maybe for your own home or for the nursery/childrens room. ------------------------------------------- Can be any word or name. Some examples - GRANNY, NANNY, NANA, GRANDMA, GRANDAD, GRANDPA, MUMMY, MUM, DADDY, DAD, SISTER, BROTHER, BABY, FRIEND, WIFE, HUSBAND, MR & MRS, LOVE, HOME, WELCOME, ANY AGE OR A NAME? The possibilities are endless! ------------------------------------------- Can be any colour theme. You tell me the colour theme you would like. You can have them solid or vintage distressed. (See photos) ------------------------------------------- Each cube size is 5 x 5cm and I will need 1 photo per block you order plus 2 extra for the ends. So for example 'DAD' would be 5 photos, 'MUMMY' would be 7 photos (sent to me by email) ------------------------------------------- THE PRICE IS PER BLOCK! So if you wanted the name 'HANNAH' please order 6. If you want the name 'DAD' please order 3. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to discuss your order! You will then need to send me the photos and tell me the name/word colours ect. Then once you're happy I'll get making! ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 4 weeks to make (depends how busy my order books are and also on how quickly my supplier can cut the wood out) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!) Disclaimer : These are are not intended to be toys or to be used as buliding blocks. They have not been safety tested and have small parts. They are keepsake decorative items.

name: Made to Order - Cupcake T-Shirt
description: Unique clothing you won't find on the high street! This design is designed by me and can be made for any age. You can have any colour t-shirt but normally white is best. This is a SHORT sleeved item but I can put them onto long sleeved if you wish, please contact me if you'd like long sleeved. I’m always up for trying new designs so if you have something in mind contact me :) ------------------------------------------- Machine wash on cool setting, Do not tumble dry, Do not iron. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to finalise your order and confirm sizes ect. ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 4 weeks to make (depends how busy I am) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!) The shapes and colours may be different to what is shown here. Please remember all of my products are handmade, so there may be small differences between the goods you receive. Therefore because my products are not mass-produced, you have an item which is unique!

I’m always up for trying new designs so if you have something in mind contact me :) ------------------------------------------- Machine wash on cool setting, Do not tumble dry, Do not iron. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to finalise your order and confirm sizes ect. ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 4 weeks to make (depends how busy I am) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!) The shapes and colours may be different to what is shown here. Please remember all of my products are handmade, so there may be small differences between the goods you receive. Therefore because my products are not mass-produced, you have an item which is unique!

name: Made to Order - Mini Countdown Chalk Boards (Baby)
description: These mini countdown chalkboards are handmade and handpainted at Vintage Dream. The black chalkboard is wipeable with a dry cloth and a perfect way of counting down the days to a special event. ------------------------------------------- Can be personalised with any message. Here are some examples - 'Days until our wedding' 'Days until we become mr & mrs' 'Days until our baby girl is due' 'Days until our baby boy is due' 'Days until Christmas' Or can be 'Weeks until...' or just 'Days to go' or 'Weeks to go' so it can be used for different event countdowns. ------------------------------------------- They can be any colour theme. You tell me the colour theme you would like. ------------------------------------------- Size of chalkboard heart is 8cm approx and the background heart is 10cm approx. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to discuss your order! You will then need to tell me the words and colours ect. Then once you're happy I'll get making! ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 4 weeks to make (depends how busy my order books are and also on how quickly my supplier can cut the wood out) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!) Disclaimer : These are are not intended to be toys. They have not been safety tested and have small parts. They are keepsake decorative items.

description: These handpainted gingerbread wooden keepsakes are super cute and a lovely gift idea. This for a set of 3 handpainted wooden shapes. 2 gingerbread people and 1 heart. Each shape is hand painted - one pink for the girl, blue for the boy and a red heart, customised with the couples names and special date! name: Made to Order - Photo Canvas
description: This beautiful photo keepsake is completely unique to you because it has your own photos on! You choose the photo you would like, send it to me and I will get to work making one of these lovely keepsakes for you... who needs a photo album when you can have one of these? :) Makes a lovely gift or to display in your home. It doesn't have to be a heart shape, it can be sqaure, star, any shape really :) ------------------------------------------- I have a wide range of fabrics so you can choose colours ect. Please contact me for fabric options. I have girls and boys fabrics, let me know what colours and themes you would like. I can then send photos of the fabrics I have and you can choose. ------------------------------------------- There are 3 size options Small - 20cm x 20cm Medium - 30cm x 30cm Large - 40cm x 40cm ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to discuss your order! I will need you to send me the photos via email and discuss the fabric combinations ect, then once you're happy I'll get making! ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 4 weeks to make (depends how busy I am) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!) name: Made to Order - Comfort Tag Blanket (Name personalisation available) (girls)
description: If your little one takes more notice of the tags on a toy than they do the toy itself... or likes playing with the care labels on clothes then this tag blanket is perfect! Also the tag blanket is a great comforter for babies and infants! Ideal to cuddle and hold while getting to sleep. Your baby can also feel all the different textures of the blanket - silky ribbon, soft fleece and cotton ------------------------------------------- This can also be personalised with baby/childs name or initials. You may want a special date (birthday/christening date) I can do that too! Please note this is an extra charge - When ordering please add the WITH name personalisation option into your cart. ------------------------------------------- I can do lots of different designs on it for you, such as cars, boats, butterfly, flower and many more! name: Made to Order - Babygrow Keepsake Memory Blanket
description: Lovely keepsake memory blankets using your little ones precious and favourite babygrows/clothing. Handmade with care using precious baby grows and clothing to create a keepsake item to treasure for years to come. It's nice to keep your little ones first clothes but they take up space and most of the time end up in the loft or hidden away in a cupboard. Don't hide them away, have them turned into a special blanket for you little one. Each item it's lovingly made with love and care and each keepsake is unique. ------------------------------------------- Memory blankets are backed with a soft cuddly fleece to in a colour to co-ordinate with the main colours of the clothing. The front is a patchwork style using the clothing provided by you. The memory blankets come in 3 different sizes - Small (60cm x 90cm) (Using approx 25 - 35 items) Large (80cm x 110cm) (Using approx 40 - 50 items) Single bed size (Using approx 60 - 80 items) The amount of clothing depends on what size blanket you want and also the size of clothing you have. You can send a mix of sizes. I can make them using baby grows, vests, clothing, body suits, coats, hats, gloves, blankets and other fabric items. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to discuss your order! You will then need to send me the clothing. Once I have receive your items I will get to work in making a lovely keepsake for you. ------------------------------------------- (Please note this is a made to order item and may take up to 4-5 weeks to make (depends how busy my order books are) so if this is a gift for someone or you need it for a certain date please give me a much notice to ensure it arrives to you on time!)

Handmade with care using precious baby grows and clothing to create a keepsake item to treasure for years to come. It's nice to keep your little ones first clothes but they take up space and most of the time end up in the loft or hidden away in a cupboard. Don't hide them away, have them turned into a special cushion for you little one. Each item it's lovingly made with love and care and each keepsake is unique. ------------------------------------------- Memory cushions are made completely using the clothing provided by you. Both sides are the patchwork style. The cushion is approx 35cm x 35cm and includes the cushion insert. For a cushion I need at least 10 items. The amount of clothing depends on what size blanket you want and also the size of clothing you have. You can send a mix of sizes. I can make them using baby grows, vests, clothing, body suits, coats, hats, gloves, blankets and other fabric items. ------------------------------------------- Once you have placed your order please contact me to discuss your order!
